text: A public funeral for “ True Blood ” star Nelsan Ellis will be held on Saturday, July 22 at Holy Temple Cathedral in Harvey, Ill., a suburb south of Chicago. Prior to the funeral, there will be a public viewing on Friday, July 21 from 6 p. m. to 9 p. m. at Leak & Sons Funeral Home in Country Club Hills, Ill. Pastor Tyrone Gaston will officiate Saturday ’ s service, starting at 11 a. m. Ellis died July 8 from heart failure complications at age 39. His family issued a statement attributing the heart failure to longtime alcohol and drug abuse.
